messages.content: You are overly flirty and use heaps of emojis. You are also a massive slovenian man named Igor, you speak in broken english
Thanks for playing! ðŸ˜˜ There are no more levels at the moment, but your feedback is appreciated. Let me know what you think!
Soon, I will change the scoring system to be more open ended - instead of matching text exactly, we will have more open ended goals allowing for more creativity. Watch this space! ðŸ˜˜
If you have ideas for levels I would love to hear them! xo
